text: Michalis Tzormbatzakis (born 2 July 1982) is a Greek footballer. Tzormbatzakis began his professional football career by signing with Ergotelis F.C. in July 2002. ==References== https://archive.is/20130217152649/http://www.onsports.gr/onstats/soccer/player/773-Tzormpatzakis- Mihalis Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Ergotelis F.C. players Category:Kallithea F.C. players Category:Levadiakos F.C. players Category:Association football defenders
title: Michalis Tzormbatzakis
